title: The Royals So, Just How Tall Is Meghan Markle? by Sian Meades 15 hours ago
content: Meghan Markle has been very busy since her gorgeous wedding to Prince Harry . She's been easing into her new life as The Duchess of Sussex , getting ready to go on a tour of Australia , and settling into London with the help of Amal Clooney .    However, there's a question that's been on everyone's mind recently, thanks in part to her fabulous hats and high heels — just how tall is Meghan Markle? Well, we've got the answer for you: she's 5'6", which means she's quite a lot shorter than her husband and the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge. Prince Harry is 6'2", his older brother Prince William is even taller at 6'3" , while Kate Middleton is a statuesque 5'9".     Related:   When Meghan Markle Looks at Prince Harry, It's Almost as If the World Stands Still  Image Source: Getty / DOMINIC LIPINSKI
